lead_paragraph: Saul Niguez announced himself as one of Europe's most promising midfielders by scoring a stunning individual goal to edge Atletico Madrid a step closer to their second Champions League final in three years.

headline.print_headline: Atletico Hero Saul Delights in 'Most Beautiful Goal'
headline.main: Atletico Hero Saul Delights in 'Most Beautiful Goal'

snippet: Saul Niguez announced himself as one of Europe's most promising midfielders by scoring a stunning individual goal to edge Atletico Madrid a step closer to their second Champions League final in three years....
